room_title: Escape room "Escape from Alcatraz: Maximum Security" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_description: You have been accused of being a dangerous mutant by the Department of Mutant Affairs. Now an inmate of the Max Security Mutant Confinement Facility, all you can see and hear are the horrific experiments happening to other mutants around you. Next in line and unable to prove your innocence, you have but one hope: find another way out before your time is up.
